Html: Perhaps I'm missing something, but shouldn't there be a way to remove regions?  In my situation I'm removing parts of the UI based on user interaction and trying to clean up.  However, I keep getting errors when trying to remove regions.  Is there anything in the RIs that can show me how to do this?
Look at the RegionManager.Unregister( string regionname)  . It removes the a region.
Wow, i see lots of changes between drop 5 and 11609.  Looks like that should do it.
